DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the ability of CJH1 to increase the sensitivity of dopamine receptors and thereby reduce symptoms of Parkinson's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: A STUDY TO EVALUATE THE EFFICACY OF CJH1 (CLR4001) IN PARKINSON'S DISEASE
DOC.criteria: Patient's with Parkinson's disease Contraindications to study medication
